ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class TransformGroup

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Group
      ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.TransformGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node
public class TransformGroup
extends Group

A TransformGroup is a Group that has a transformation stored. It can therefore be used to store multiple elements that need to apply the same transformation.

Constructor Summary
TransformGroup()
          Instantiates a new transform group.

updatePositionFromPhysic

public void updatePositionFromPhysic()
Description copied from interface: Node
Reflects the position change of the node back from the physics world. This is used to keep the position of the physics world and the visual world in synchronization.
